articles.title: How migration regenerates declining towns
articles.description: What really happens when a "flood of migrants" gets "dumped" on a small heartland town.
articles.content:

articles.author: Samuel Wade
articles.title: Marie Holzman: Thoughts on Ilham Tohti’s Arrest in 2014
articles.description: To mark the tenth anniversary on Monday of his sentencing to life in prison, Marie Holzman writes at the online human-rights journal Diyin on Ilham Tohti’s case and its enduring significance. The essay, which is also available in Chinese and is reproduced her…
